vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.30;
son of: Gilead (H1568H);
brother of: Abiezer (H0044I), Asriel (H0844), Shechem (H7928), Shemida (H8061) and Hepher (H2660A)
Group of che.leq (חֵ֫לֶק "Helek" H2507)
§ Helekites = "flattering"
descendants of Helek
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendant de Hélec; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希勒族 这个種族名稱陽性名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "阿諛的"
希勒的後裔(民 26:30)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希勒族 这个种族名称阳性名词在希伯来文的意思是 "阿谀的"
希勒的后裔(民 26:30)
